LYn

Korean: 린

Hometown:

Namyangju, Gyeonggi

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Lee Se-jin
Native name:
이세진
Birthday:
Nov 9, 1981
Age:
43 years old
Blood type:
AB
Height:
5'7" (169 cm)

Introduction

LYn is a South Korean singer under 325 E&C and COMPANY919.

She made her debut on December 13, 2000 with the full album "My First Confession" under her real name, Lee Sejin. The release wasn't successful and so she choose not to pursue her career for some times.

She came back in 2002 under the stage name Lyn with the release of her second album, "Have You Ever Had Heart Broken?", which was a massive success, like all of her next releases.

At some point, her stage name was changed again from Lyn to LYn.

She left her company, MUSIC&NEW, in 2015 and created her own agency, COMPANY919, under which she is currently signed.
